system.availability: Requires Pre-existing Bionic Limb. Doesn't count as a seperate cybernetic system from the cybernetic limb it is a part of. If Inbuilt Blade is Best Quality, it is hidden when not active, requiring -20 Scrutiny Test to notice. If limb is depowered, so is this. Has Profile (1d10 R, Balanced).
system.cost: Character with Cybernetic Limb that doesn't already have an installed weapon can have this installed, Requires +0 Tech-Use Test and several Hours
